verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Toiling on, toiling on,
Toiling on, toiling on;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Let us hope, let us watch,
and labor
till the Master comes.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
To the work! To the work!
we are servants of God,
Let us follow the path
that our Master has trod;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
With the balm of His counsel our strength to renew,
Let us do with our might
what our hands find to do.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
To the work! To the work!
Let the hungry be fed,
To the fountain of life
let the weary be led;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
In the cross and its banner
our glory shall be,
While we herald the tidings,
“Salvation is free!”

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
To the work! to the work
there is labor for all,
For the kingdom of darkness
and error shall fall;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
And the name of Jehovah
exalted shall be
In the loud swelling chorus,
“Salvation is free!”

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
To the work! to the work!
in the strength of the Lord,
And a robe and a crown
shall our labor reward

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
When the home of the faithful our dwelling
shall be
And we shout with the ransomed,
“Salvation is free!”
